BatchMetadataUpdate(uint256,uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a range of tokens is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFTs.

MetadataUpdate(uint256).details: This event emits when the metadata of a token is changed. So that the third-party platforms such as NFT market could timely update the images and related attributes of the NFT.
